thread.title: An Elderly Iraqi Woman Died After Trump’s Travel Ban Barred Her From the U.S.
thread.title_full: An Elderly Iraqi Woman Died After Trump’s Travel Ban Barred Her From the U.S.

author: Claire Landsbaum
title: An Elderly Iraqi Woman Died After Trump’s Travel Ban Barred Her From the U.S.
text: Mike Hager, a Michigan business owner who fled Iraq during the Gulf War, was traveling with his niece, two nephews, and his 75-year-old mother, Naimma, when Donald Trump signed an executive action barring citizens and refugees from seven Muslim-majority countries from entering the United States. They’d been in... More »
